author: Navya Malini
title: song: Bhoomi Trivedi sings for Ramli Rickshawali - Times of India
text:
Ramli Rickshawali is an upcoming Gujarati film which hit the floor recently. While the announcement of the making of the film went viral on the world of web, what caught the attention was playback singer Bhoomi Trivedi , known for her Bollywood number Ram Chahe Lila in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Rami-Leela.
While the Vadodara based singer has many melodious numbers to her credit, what is getting talked about a lot is the song in which Bhoomi has lent her voice. Another star attraction in the film is Heena Rajput who plays the lead in the film. The according to sources is an effort to bring to light the role that the autorickshaw plays in our lives.
Watch the making of Ramli Rackshawali
